Package com.andre.controller

Class SummaryController

java.lang.Object
com.andre.template.ControllerTemplate
com.andre.controller.SummaryController
@RestController @RequestMapping("summarys") public class SummaryController extends ControllerTemplate
SummaryController handles requests related to summaries. It allows for retrieving, updating, adding, and deleting summaries, as well as writing comments based on the summaries.

  • Method Details

    • getAllSummarys

      @GetMapping public Map<String,Object> getAllSummarys()
      Retrieves all summaries.
      Returns:
      a map containing the list of summaries and a success message.

    • updateASummary

      @PostMapping("/updateSummary.do") public Map<String,Object> updateASummary(@RequestBody SummaryVO summary)
      Retrieves a summary by its ID.
      Parameters:
      summary - SummaryVO summary the summary object containing the ID.
      Returns:
      a map containing the summary and a success message.

    • addASummary

      @PostMapping public Map<String,Object> addASummary(@RequestBody SummaryVO summary)
      Adds a new summary.
      Parameters:
      summary - SummaryVO summary the summary object to be added.
      Returns:
      a map containing the status and a success or error message.

    • deleteASummary

      @PostMapping("/deleteSummary.do") public Map<String,Object> deleteASummary(@RequestParam("id") String id)
      Deletes a summary by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the summary to be deleted.
      Returns:
      a map containing the status and a success or error message.

    • writeAComment

      @PostMapping("/writeAComment.do") public Map<String,Object> writeAComment(@RequestBody List<SummaryVO> summarys)
      Writes a comment based on the provided summaries.
      Parameters:
      summarys - a list of SummaryVO summaries containing the comments to be written.
      Returns:
      a map containing the list of summaries, the status of the comment writing operation, and a success message.
